mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rnum, A.* FROM (SELECT id as memberCode, name as memberName, email, password, phone_number as phone, created_at as regDate, point, member_level as memberLevel, image_name as memberImgName, image_path as memberImgPath, image_size as memberImgSize, info as memberInfo FROM member ORDER BY id DESC) A) WHERE rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow}
